posts.post_title: t204 Freeman PR/FR ...card is now sold!
posts.post_content:
Got a few wrinkles to him so he's definitely an affordable specimen to anyone needing him.  Clear sharp photo and no back damage at all.  


***card is now sold!***

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=195851&d=1435520780[/IMG]

Hi Brian,
OK, I'll take it for $60 - shall I paypal you?

Tim
Thanks Tim, you got it...sent you a PM...
